sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { ArrowLeft, Calendar, Clock, Star, CheckCircle, Sparkles, User, ArrowRight, } from "lucide-react"; import { counsellors } from "../data/mockData"; const AppointmentBooking = () => { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [selectedCounsellor, setSelectedCounsellor] = useState(null); const [selectedSlot, setSelectedSlot] = useState(null); const [showBookingForm, setShowBookingForm] = useState(false); const [bookingDetails, setBookingDetails] = useState({ issue: "", notes: "", priority: "Medium", }); const [isBookingComplete, setIsBookingComplete] = useState(false); const [showFlashMessage, setShowFlashMessage] = useState(false); const [flashMessage, setFlashMessage] = useState(""); const [showTicketForm, setShowTicketForm] = useState(false); const [ticketId, setTicketId] = useState(""); const handleBookAppointment = () => { if (selectedCounsellor && selectedSlot) { setShowBookingForm(true); } }; const handleSubmitBooking = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsBookingComplete(true); // Simulate booking success setTimeout(() => { alert("Appointment booked successfully!"); navigate("/dashboard"); }, 2000); }; if (isBookingComplete) { return (

Booking Confirmed!

Your appointment has been successfully booked. You will receive a confirmation email shortly.

Counsellor: {selectedCounsellor?.name}

Date: {selectedSlot?.date}

Time: {selectedSlot?.time}

); } return (
{/* Header */}

Book an Appointment

Mental Health Support

{!showBookingForm ? ( /* Counsellor Selection */

Select a Counsellor

Choose from our team of experienced mental health professionals

{counsellors.map((counsellor, index) => (
setSelectedCounsellor(counsellor)} >
{counsellor.name .split(" ") .map((n) => n[0]) .join("")}

{counsellor.name}

{counsellor.specialization}

{counsellor.experience} experience
{counsellor.rating}/5.0 rating

Available Slots:

{counsellor.availableSlots .filter((slot) => slot.available) .slice(0, 2) .map((slot, slotIndex) => (
{ e.stopPropagation(); setSelectedSlot(slot); }} >
{slot.date} {slot.time}
))}
))}
{selectedCounsellor && selectedSlot && (

Selected Appointment

Review your selection before booking

{selectedCounsellor.name .split(" ") .map((n) => n[0]) .join("")}

{selectedCounsellor.name}

{selectedCounsellor.specialization}

{selectedSlot.date}

{selectedSlot.time}

)}
) : ( /* Booking Form */

Complete Your Booking

Please provide some details about your appointment
